remarks: Move class substitution in and out of an operation.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Nov-2005.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 5-Dec-2016.) Obsolete as of 20-Aug-2018.  Use ~ csbov123 instead. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement: csbovgOLD $p |- ( A e. D -> [_ A / x ]_ ( B F C ) = ( [_ A / x ]_ B [_ A / x ]_ F [_ A / x ]_ C ) ) $.
